Name: Ants
About the game: Save the ants! The ants need a new home. Help them find their way to their new ant hills. You'll place arrows and tunnels to help guide them, avoiding obstacles such as rocks, water, ant traps, and spiders. Over 240 puzzling levels of challenge and fun await you, with new bonus levels added every few weeks. Levels range from easy to mind-bendingly difficult. â€‹ Your solution is rated from 1 to 4 stars, and the high scores list lets you see how you stack up against players all over the world. Download the separate Level Editor so you can create and play your own levels! Not sure if you want to purchase Ants? Try the free demo first. It includes over 30 of the 240+ levels.
